title: Letterboxd Reviews (2024)
subtitle: Letterboxd reviews and ratings, ideal for sentiment analysis.
description: Letterboxd movie reviews and ratings scraped from both the popular movies page (https://letterboxd.com/films/popular/) as well as recent reviews from users found on popular members pages (https://letterboxd.com/members/popular/this/week/). This dataset is ideal for sentiment analysis and other machine learning tasks.

resources.description: Contains reviews scraped from the popular members page.

fields.name: movie_name
fields.description: The name of the movie the review is about.

fields.name: rating
fields.description: The normalized rating given by the reviewer (scale of 0 to 1).

fields.name: movie_year
fields.description: The release year of the movie.

fields.name: user_url
fields.description: The URL of the user who made the review.
